name: Time Travel Toddlers
description:
When the mean kid at daycare steals the toy you're playing with, it means war! But hold on, what's this? Where'd this portal come from? Where are we? How will we get home?

This game was created for Driftwood Gaming's Build Your Own Game Jam, where participants had to choose at least two of the following themes:

  • Purple.
  • Dungeon Crawler.
  • Survival.
  • Not what it seems.
  • Tactics.
  • Silent Protagonist and Silent Villain/Antagonist.
  • Hidden Cheat(s).
  • Time Travel.
  • Permadeath.
  • Babies.

Can you spot how many themes are used?
